name.Description: The resource name

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

identity.Description: Managed service identity of the resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

description.Description: Description of the data collection endpoint.

immutableId.Description: The immutable ID of this data collection endpoint resource. This property is READ-ONLY.

configurationAccess.Description: The endpoint used by clients to access their configuration.

logsIngestion.Description: The endpoint used by clients to ingest logs.

metricsIngestion.Description: The endpoint used by clients to ingest metrics.

networkAcls.Description: Network access control rules for the endpoints.

provisioningState.Description: The resource provisioning state. This property is READ-ONLY.

privateLinkScopedResources.Description: List of Azure Monitor Private Link Scope Resources to which this data collection endpoint resource is associated. This property is READ-ONLY.

failoverConfiguration.Description: Failover configuration on this endpoint. This property is READ-ONLY.

metadata.Description: Metadata for the resource. This property is READ-ONLY.

endpoint.Description: The endpoint. This property is READ-ONLY.
The endpoint. This property is READ-ONLY.
The endpoint. This property is READ-ONLY.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: The configuration to set whether network access from public internet to the endpoints are allowed.

resourceId.Description: The resourceId of the Azure Monitor Private Link Scope Scoped Resource through which this DCE is associated with a Azure Monitor Private Link Scope.

scopeId.Description: The immutableId of the Azure Monitor Private Link Scope Resource to which the association is.

activeLocation.Description: Active location where data flow will occur.

locations.Description: Locations that are configured for failover.

provisioningStatus.Description: The resource provisioning state in this location.

provisionedBy.Description: Azure offering managing this resource on-behalf-of customer.

provisionedByResourceId.Description: Resource Id of azure offering managing this resource on-behalf-of customer.

principalId.Description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.Description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

description.Description: Description of the data collection rule.

immutableId.Description: The immutable ID of this data collection rule. This property is READ-ONLY.

dataCollectionEndpointId.Description: The resource ID of the data collection endpoint that this rule can be used with.

streamDeclarations.Description: Declaration of custom streams used in this rule.

dataSources.Description:
The specification of data sources. 
This property is optional and can be omitted if the rule is meant to be used via direct calls to the provisioned endpoint.

columns.Description: List of columns used by data in this stream.

name.Description: The name of the column.

type.Description: The type of the column data.

performanceCounters.Description: The list of performance counter data source configurations.

windowsEventLogs.Description: The list of Windows Event Log data source configurations.

syslog.Description: The list of Syslog data source configurations.

extensions.Description: The list of Azure VM extension data source configurations.

logFiles.Description: The list of Log files source configurations.

iisLogs.Description: The list of IIS logs source configurations.

windowsFirewallLogs.Description: The list of Windows Firewall logs source configurations.

prometheusForwarder.Description: The list of Prometheus forwarder data source configurations.

platformTelemetry.Description: The list of platform telemetry configurations

dataImports.Description: Specifications of pull based data sources

streams.Description:
List of streams that this data source will be sent to.
A stream indicates what schema will be used for this data and usually what table in Log Analytics the data will be sent to.

samplingFrequencyInSeconds.Description: The number of seconds between consecutive counter measurements (samples).

counterSpecifiers.Description:
A list of specifier names of the performance counters you want to collect.
Use a wildcard (*) to collect a counter for all instances.
To get a list of performance counters on Windows, run the command 'typeperf'.

name.Description:
A friendly name for the data source. 
This name should be unique across all data sources (regardless of type) within the data collection rule.

streams.Description:
List of streams that this data source will be sent to.
A stream indicates what schema will be used for this data and usually what table in Log Analytics the data will be sent to.

xPathQueries.Description: A list of Windows Event Log queries in XPATH format.

The list of label inclusion filters in the form of label "name-value" pairs.

Label values are matched case-insensitively.

name.Description: The resource name

properties.Description: The action groups properties of the resource.

groupShortName.Description: The short name of the action group. This will be used in SMS messages.

enabled.Description: Indicates whether this action group is enabled. If an action group is not enabled, then none of its receivers will receive communications.

emailReceivers.Description: The list of email receivers that are part of this action group.

smsReceivers.Description: The list of SMS receivers that are part of this action group.

webhookReceivers.Description: The list of webhook receivers that are part of this action group.

itsmReceivers.Description: The list of ITSM receivers that are part of this action group.

azureAppPushReceivers.Description: The list of AzureAppPush receivers that are part of this action group.

automationRunbookReceivers.Description: The list of AutomationRunbook receivers that are part of this action group.

voiceReceivers.Description: The list of voice receivers that are part of this action group.

logicAppReceivers.Description: The list of logic app receivers that are part of this action group.

azureFunctionReceivers.Description: The list of azure function receivers that are part of this action group.

armRoleReceivers.Description: The list of ARM role receivers that are part of this action group. Roles are Azure RBAC roles and only built-in roles are supported.

eventHubReceivers.Description: The list of event hub receivers that are part of this action group.

name.Description: The name of the email receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

emailAddress.Description: The email address of this receiver.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

status.Description: The receiver status of the e-mail.

name.Description: The name of the SMS receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

countryCode.Description: The country code of the SMS receiver.

phoneNumber.Description: The phone number of the SMS receiver.

name.Description: The name of the webhook receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

serviceUri.Description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

useAadAuth.Description: Indicates whether or not use AAD authentication.

objectId.Description: Indicates the webhook app object Id for aad auth.

identifierUri.Description: Indicates the identifier uri for aad auth.

tenantId.Description: Indicates the tenant id for aad auth.

name.Description: The name of the Itsm receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

connectionId.Description: Unique identification of ITSM connection among multiple defined in above workspace.

ticketConfiguration.Description: JSON blob for the configurations of the ITSM action. CreateMultipleWorkItems option will be part of this blob as well.

region.Description: Region in which workspace resides. Supported values:'centralindia','japaneast','southeastasia','australiasoutheast','uksouth','westcentralus','canadacentral','eastus','westeurope'

name.Description: The name of the Azure mobile app push receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

emailAddress.Description: The email address registered for the Azure mobile app.

automationAccountId.Description: The Azure automation account Id which holds this runbook and authenticate to Azure resource.

webhookResourceId.Description: The resource id for webhook linked to this runbook.

isGlobalRunbook.Description: Indicates whether this instance is global runbook.

name.Description: Indicates name of the webhook.

serviceUri.Description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

name.Description: The name of the voice receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

countryCode.Description: The country code of the voice receiver.

phoneNumber.Description: The phone number of the voice receiver.

name.Description: The name of the logic app receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

resourceId.Description: The azure resource id of the logic app receiver.

callbackUrl.Description: The callback url where http request sent to.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

name.Description: The name of the azure function receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

functionAppResourceId.Description: The azure resource id of the function app.

functionName.Description: The function name in the function app.

httpTriggerUrl.Description: The http trigger url where http request sent to.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

name.Description: The name of the arm role receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

name.Description: The name of the Event hub receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

eventHubName.Description: The name of the specific Event Hub queue

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

tenantId.Description: The tenant Id for the subscription containing this event hub

subscriptionId.Description: The Id for the subscription containing this event hub
